dmca.title: Ness objects to posting of contract
dmca.body:
Dear [private]:

I am General Counsel of Ness Global Services, Inc. ("Ness"), formerly known as Apar Infotech Corporation ("Apar").  It has come to my attention that your website, Onecle.com, has posted a copy of an Extended Development Center between Apar and Portal Software, Inc. ("Portal") at http://contracts.onecle.com/portal/apar.dev.2002.08.29.shtml.

I do not know how you acquired a copy of the Agreement, but you are hereby notified that your posting of it is unauthorized.  Accordingly, Ness hereby demands that you cease and desist from making the Agreement available for viewing over Onecle.com or any other affiliated website and that you remove it from your system immediately.

If you fail to remove the Agreement, Ness will take appropriate legal steps as necessary to protect its interests.  Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,



[private]
